text: Ha! Jenumanja ni awala wankuwilanjidwa kuti ntole petala lya Allah, basi wane mwa jenumanja pana waakutenda ubayili. Sano jwaakutenda ubayili nikuti akutenda ubayili waalikonya nsyene, sano Allah ni Jwakupata kwejinji, nambo jenumanja ni wakulaga. Nambo naga nkugalauka (kuleka Usilamu, Allah) tantindanye niwandu wane wangawaga jenumanja, soni ngasawa wanti mpela jenumanja (tachiwa wambone)
